en-US.summary: Test your knowledge of Europe's capital cities!
examplePhrases: Alexa tell European Capitals Trivia to start a game
Alexa tell European Capitals Trivia I want to play
en-US.name: European Capitals Trivia
en-US.description: Learn about the political geography of Europe with European Capitals Trivia! Each round is consists of ten multiple-choice questions. Answer by speaking the number associated with the correct city.
